sentences.english: It was then I noticed tears glistening on my mother's cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 恰在此时，我看到妈妈的面颊上闪着晶莹的泪光。

sentences.english: On the flourishing land, we turn the tears we had on the way into the treasure-trove.
sentences.chinese: 在繁华的岸上，把沿途的泪光，都埋成了宝藏。

sentences.english: At this time, Wang Yaner eyes tears.
sentences.chinese: 此时的王燕儿眼睛里也泛起泪光。

sentences.english: Glistening tears are your shinning light.
sentences.chinese: 班驳闪烁的泪光是你的光芒。

sentences.english: Then he saw it through his tears.
sentences.chinese: 在一片泪光中，他见到了拔下来的智齿。

sentences.english: And a glory that shines upon our tears.
sentences.chinese: 荣誉在莹莹泪光里闪耀。

sentences.english: I felt my eyes30)glisten. I was speechless.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己的眼里泛着泪光，一时无语。

sentences.english: Tears across the sky, leaving a pool of water marks, it is only inviting sad.
sentences.chinese: 泪光划过天际，留下一滩水迹，也只不过是徒增伤感。

sentences.english: Dear moon, let tears-eyes to love you.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的月光，让小泪光来照顾你吧。

sentences.english: Ying-Ying talked tears, smiling, stay in contact each other and became friends.
sentences.chinese: 谈得泪光盈盈，笑容满面，互留联系方式，成了好友。

sentences.english: Her eyes bled the viscous color of tears.
sentences.chinese: 嘴角凌厉的表情不见了，眼里泛着泪光。

sentences.english: But now, she touched her brother’s name and burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，她轻抚着哥哥的名字，眼中泛出了泪光。

definition: to hold in (usually refers the mouth or eyes)
to choke with emotion/to choke with sobs
